logos.name: Arctyll Logo
logos.description: The official Arctyll logo - use this for all main branding purposes.

colors.name: Arctyll Purple
colors.usage: Primary brand color - main purple used for buttons, links, and key elements

colors.name: Arctyll Indigo
colors.usage: Secondary brand color - indigo accent used in gradients and highlights

colors.name: Dark Secondary
colors.usage: Secondary dark background for cards and components

colors.name: Dark Tertiary
colors.usage: Tertiary dark background for hover states and accents

typography.name: Outfit
typography.usage: Primary font family used throughout all Arctyll products and interfaces

typography.name: System Sans
typography.usage: Fallback font for improved performance in specific contexts

typography.name: Monospace
typography.usage: Used for code blocks, technical documentation, and version numbers

guidelines.title: Use Appropriately
guidelines.description: Only use the logo to represent official Arctyll projects and partnerships. Never use in unrelated projects or unauthorized forks.

guidelines.title: Maintain Clear Space
guidelines.description: Keep at least 2x the logo height as clear space around the logo on all sides to preserve visual integrity.

guidelines.title: Use Official Colors
guidelines.description: Stick to the official Arctyll purple (#8b5cf6) and indigo (#6366f1) color palette for consistency.

guidelines.title: Use Provided Assets
guidelines.description: Always use official, high-resolution logo files from the brand repository. Do not recreate or trace the logo.

guidelines.title: Use Brand Fonts
guidelines.description: Always pair the logo with approved brand typography for consistency in all designs.

guidelines.title: Use Correct File Formats
guidelines.description: Use vector or PNG logos as provided. SVG for web, PNG for documents, and other formats as specified.

guidelines.title: Don't Distort
guidelines.description: Never stretch, warp, rotate, skew, or otherwise distort the logo proportions.

guidelines.title: No Visual Effects
guidelines.description: Don't apply shadows, glows, gradients, overlays, or other visual filters to the logo.

guidelines.title: Avoid Poor Contrast
guidelines.description: Don't place the logo on busy backgrounds or use it where there isn't sufficient contrast for readability.

guidelines.title: Don't Crop or Clip
guidelines.description: The logo should never be cropped, clipped, or partially hidden.

guidelines.title: Respect Minimum Size
guidelines.description: Do not scale the logo below its minimum recommended size to maintain legibility.

guidelines.title: Consistent Placement
guidelines.description: Place the logo in a consistent location (e.g., top left or bottom right) across branded assets.

guidelines.title: Monochrome Usage
guidelines.description: Use monochrome logo variants only in single-color print or restricted branding contexts.

guidelines.title: No Background Shapes
guidelines.description: Avoid placing the logo inside shapes or containers that aren't part of the official branding.

guidelines.title: No Opacity Changes
guidelines.description: Do not lower the opacity of the logo. Always use it at 100% opacity.
